Section2.title: I design, develop, and create optimized applications through good development practices.

Jumbotron.title: Software Developer focused on web and mobile applications.

About.competence: Experience in creating and maintaining APIs, landing pages, back-office portals, and online stores. Beyond code, I monitor application performance and support system maintenance.

Job1.name: Neway
Job1.activities: I fix bugs, implement new features, and provide support for the company's systems.

Job2.name: Split Risk
Job2.activities: I assisted other developers in creating landing pages and supported web project prototyping using Figma.

Job3.name: Online Shopping
Job3.activities: I provided technical assistance to the company's clients and employees.

Services.frontend: I create intuitive interfaces with a focus on details, smooth interactions, and micro-animations that enhance the user experience.
Services.backend: I develop back-ends, prioritizing efficient data management and scalability to support platform growth.
Services.fullstack: I integrate complete solutions combining front-end and back-end, ensuring high performance, scalability, and an enhanced experience.
